JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Qualifications:   Any IT Graduate       Expertise in ASP.Net, C#, ASP.Net MVC, VB.Net, C#, Framework 2.0, 3.5, HTML Java Script, ADO.Net, JQuery, Windows Application, WebWeb service. Excellent debugging and troubleshooting Skills.   Careers in .Net oriented.
